name: Death Camp - Initiation
description:
A Third/First-person shooter with a tiny bit of horror elements.

Still need to add some finishing touches for the the final submission. It's playable as is but needs some visual treatment. Placeholder assets need to be replaced with proper art.

Based on the Theme (Death is only the beginning) You play as a newly dead rookie, Thrown straight into Camp Death -= Training grounds for the newly dead.
